content: I've actually been meaning to organize my files and folders for a while now, and I did a big cleanup about three weeks ago. I created separate folders for work, personal, and entertainment, and even set up a cloud backup system so I can access my files from anywhere. It's been a huge help, and I feel much more organized now. But I appreciate the additional tips, especially the one about using descriptive file names and categorizing with tags or labels. I'll definitely implement those this weekend.
